name: Beyond The Stars (Coding Kittens)
description:
A small chase horror game.  You play as a space dragon trying to escape a monster that's chasing you so you can get back to your home. 

Note: The browser version doesn't work it Safari, but it does work in Google Chrome, it is also best if played in full screen.

 I made all of the assets, with some help from my brother for the sound effects.  sorry if it's not scary, this is my first horror game and I haven't made anything horror like before, but I thought it would be fun to try.
